TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlType extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier

summary.span: 标识用户界面 (UI) 控件的类型。

span.span: Identifies the type of a user interface (UI) control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承自 并用于标识由表示的控件的类型 。 inherits from and is used to identify the type of a control represented by an . 控件类型由 UI 自动化提供程序的开发人员确定。The control type is determined by the developer of the UI Automation provider. 此类包含静态字段，它们本身就是 对象，用于标识控件的标准类型。This class contains static fields, which are themselves objects, to identify the standard types of controls. 还有一个与 定义类型不匹配的控件的类型。There is also a type for controls that do not match one of the defined types. 控件的控件类型在运行时可能更改的唯一情况是控件支持的位置 。The only case where a control's control type might change at run time is where the control supports . 例如， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 列表视图是一个 或 ，这取决于当前视图。An example is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] list view, which can be a or , depending on the current view. 控件类型与控件模式之间没有一对一的等效性。Control types do not have a one-to-one equivalence to control patterns. 一个控件只能为一种类型，但它可能支持多种模式或根本无模式，具体取决于其特定功能。A control can be of only one type, but it may support multiple patterns or no patterns at all, depending on its specific functionality. 有关各种控件类型的详细信息，请参阅 [UI 自动化控件类型](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-types)。For detailed information on the various control types, see [UI Automation Control Types](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-types).

related.span: UI 自动化控件类型概述

span.span: UI Automation Control Types Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Button
Public Shared ReadOnly Button As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个按钮控件。

span.span: Identifies a button control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按钮在被单击时执行一个操作。Buttons perform a single action when clicked. 按钮可用作独立控件或作为其他控件类型中的子控件。A button can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，组合框控件中的下拉箭头为按钮。For example, the drop-down arrow in a combo box control is a button. 用作子控件时，在树的控件视图中， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] (不在内容视图) 中。When used as a subcontrol, a button is in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in the content view).

related.span: UI 自动化对 Button 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Button Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Calendar
Public Shared ReadOnly Calendar As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个日历控件，例如日期选取器。

span.span: Identifies a calendar control, such as a date-picker.

related.span: UI 自动化对 Calendar 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Calendar Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType CheckBox
Public Shared ReadOnly CheckBox As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个复选框控件。

span.span: Identifies a check box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复选框可用作独立控件或作为其他控件类型中的子控件。A check box can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，网格控件中某行开头的一个复选框，用于选择用于操作) 内容的行 (显示在控件视图中，而不是显示在内容视图中。For example, a check box at the beginning of a row in a grid control that is used to select the row (used to manipulate the content) appears in the control view but not in the content view. 但是，表示数据的窗体中的带标记的复选框位于 "内容" 和 "控件" 视图中。However, a labeled checkbox in a form that represents data is in the content and control views.

related.span: UI 自动化对 CheckBox 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the CheckBox Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ComboBox
Public Shared ReadOnly ComboBox As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个组合框控件。

span.span: Identifies a combo box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组合框控件有两种变体。There are two variations of combo box controls. 简单组合框将显示一个列表，用户可从中进行选择。A simple combo box presents a list that a user can select from. 可编辑的组合框显示一个选项列表，还包含一个可编辑文本区域，用户可以在其中键入选项，而不是限制为从列表中选择。An editable combo box presents a list of choices and also has an editable text area where a user can type in a choice instead of being limited to selecting from the choices in the list.

related.span: UI 自动化对 ComboBox 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the ComboBox Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Custom
Public Shared ReadOnly Custom As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个控件，该控件不属于已定义的控件类型之一。

span.span: Identifies a control that is not one of the defined control types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件类型指示未标识为预定义控件类型之一 (如 或) 的控件 。The control type indicates a control that is not identified as one of the predefined control types (such as or ). 控件开发人员应检查其他控件类型，然后将其控件指定为 控件类型，以确保其控件不提供与定义的控件类型之一相同的功能。Control developers should check the other control types before designating their control as a control type to be sure that their control does not provide the same functionality as one of the defined control types. 控件类型需要提供程序的额外工作才能实现 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 。A control type requires extra work for the provider to implement [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]. 此外，UI 自动化客户端产品将无法根据控件的控件类型预测控件结构、键盘交互和可能的控件模式。Also, UI Automation client products will not be able to anticipate the control structure, keyboard interaction, and possible control patterns based on the control type of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType DataGrid
Public Shared ReadOnly DataGrid As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个数据网格控件。

span.span: Identifies a data grid control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单元格仅包含文本时，控件类型应为 。When the cells contain only text, the control type should be .

span.span: UI Automation Support for the DataGrid Control Type

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可以包含许多其他控件的复杂项。A is a complex item that can contain many other controls.

span.span: UI Automation Support for the DataItem Control Type

Public Shared ReadOnly Document As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个文档控件。

span.span: Identifies a document control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档包含多行文本内容。A document contains text content of more than one line.

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Document Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Edit
Public Shared ReadOnly Edit As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个编辑控件，例如一个文本框。

span.span: Identifies an edit control, such as a text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可用作独立控件或作为其他控件类型中的子控件。An control can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，用户可以在组合框控件中键入值的区域是一个 控件，在这种情况下，该控件不是内容视图的一部分。For example, the area where a user can type in a value in a combo box control is an control, and in this case the control is not part of the content view. 控件还可以表示包含密码的控件。 controls can also represent controls that contain passwords. 属性使产品（如屏幕阅读器）知道是否要显示内容。The property enables products such as screen readers to know whether to reveal the contents.

related.span: UI 自动化对 Edit 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Edit Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern[] GetNeverSupportedPatterns() cil managed

summary.span: 检索控件类型不支持的模式标识符。

span.span: Retrieves the pattern identifiers that are not supported by the control type.

returns.span: 一个 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 模式标识符数组。

span.span: An array of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] pattern identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法对于 UI 自动化客户端（如提供程序实现的测试框架）非常有用，它需要查找此控件类型上不允许的所有控件模式。This method is useful for UI Automation clients such as test frameworks for a provider implementation that need to find all control patterns that are not permitted on this control type. ## Examples 下面的示例对 包含为类中的静态字段的每种类型都进行调用 。The following example calls on every kind of contained as a static field in the class. [!code-csharp[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/CSharp/GetPatternsForm.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/visualbasic/getpatternsform.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern[][] GetRequiredPatternSets() cil managed

summary.span: 检索所需模式集的数组。

span.span: Retrieves an array of sets of required patterns.
An array of sets of required patterns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组的每个元素都包含一个模式数组，并且具有此控件类型的每个元素都必须至少支持其中一个数组。Each element of the array contains an array of patterns, and each element that has this control type must support at least one of these arrays. 此方法对于需要查找所有可能模式的 UI 自动化客户端非常有用，例如，用于提供程序实现的测试框架。This method is useful for UI Automation clients that need to find all possible patterns, such as testing frameworks for a provider implementation. ## Examples 下面的示例对 包含为类中的静态字段的每种类型都进行调用 。The following example calls on every kind of contained as a static field in the class. [!code-csharp[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/CSharp/GetPatternsForm.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/visualbasic/getpatternsform.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty[] GetRequiredProperties() cil managed

summary.span: 检索此控件类型必需的属性 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] 的数组。

span.span: Retrieves an array of the required property [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] for this control type.
An array of property [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法对于需要查找所有可能属性的 UI 自动化客户端非常有用，例如，用于提供程序实现的测试框架。This method is useful for UI Automation clients that need to find all possible properties, such as testing frameworks for a provider implementation.

summary.span: 标识一个充当其他控件的容器的组控件。

span.span: Identifies a group control, which acts as a container for other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组是包含不同控件类型的容器控件，用于以逻辑方式关联这些控件。A group is a container control that contains different control types and is used to logically associate those controls.

Public Shared ReadOnly Hyperlink As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个超链接控件。

span.span: Identifies a hyperlink control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击控件时，超链接控件导航到指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] 。A hyperlink control navigates to a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] when a user clicks on the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Image
Public Shared ReadOnly Image As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个图像控件。

span.span: Identifies an image control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件类型可用作独立控件或作为其他控件类型中的子控件。An control type can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，按钮可以使用图像而不是文本来指示其对用户的功能。For example, a button can use an image rather than text to indicate its functionality to the user. 当仅用于装饰时，图像显示在树的控件视图中， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] (不在内容视图) 中。When used only for decorative purposes, an image appears in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in the content view).

related.span: UI 自动化对 Image 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Image Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType List
Public Shared ReadOnly List As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个列表控件，例如列表框。

span.span: Identifies a list control, such as a list box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个控件类型，它包含 并 (可能) 控件类型。A is a control type that contains and (perhaps) control types. 控件可用作独立控件或作为其他控件类型中的子控件。A control can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，组合框具有一个 控件，该控件包含单击下拉按钮时显示的选项。For example, a combo box has a control that contains choices that appear when the drop-down button is clicked. 用作子控件时， 仅在树的控件视图中， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] (不在内容视图) 中。When used as a subcontrol, a is only in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in content view). 用作子对象时，没有为其 `Name` 分配属性。When used as a subcontrol, a does not have a `Name` property assigned. 可以包含 控件。A can contain controls.

related.span: UI 自动化对 List 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the List Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType LookupById(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function LookupById (id As Integer) As ControlType

span.span: Identifier of the control type.

summary.span: 检索一个封装了指定数值标识符的 。

span.span: Retrieves a that encapsulates a specified numerical identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，控件的类型由 对象标识。Normally the type of a control is identified by a object. 此方法使您能够在仅知道数值标识符时构造此类对象。This method enables you to construct such an object when only the numerical identifier is known.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Menu
Public Shared ReadOnly Menu As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个菜单控件，例如应用程序窗口中的一个顶级菜单。

span.span: Identifies a menu control, such as a top-level menu in an application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 菜单是菜单项集合的容器;例如，单击 "文件" 时显示在 " **文件** " 下面的控件，其中包含 " **新建**"、" **打开**" 等。A menu is a container for a collection of menu items; for instance, the control that appears beneath **File** when you click on it and that contains **New**, **Open**, and so on.

related.span: UI 自动化对 Menu 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Menu Control Type

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件类型表示应用程序的顶级菜单集的容器。A control type represents the container for the set of top-level menus of an application.

related.span: UI 自动化对 MenuBar 控件类型的支持

summary.span: 标识一个窗格控件。

span.span: Identifies a pane control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于在中以可视方式分隔内容 。A is used to visually separate content within a . 用户通常通过按 TAB、F6 或 CTRL + TAB 在窗格间导航，具体取决于上下文。The user typically navigates between panes by pressing TAB, F6, or CTRL+TAB, depending on the context.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ScrollBar
Public Shared ReadOnly ScrollBar As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个滚动条控件，例如应用程序窗口中的滚动条。

span.span: Identifies a scroll bar control, such as a scroll bar in an application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件类型包含一组按钮和一个 thumb 控件，使用户可以使用鼠标滚动窗口或项容器的内容。A control type contains a set of buttons and a thumb control that enable a user using a mouse to scroll the contents of a window or item container. 使用 属性来区分与 大增量、大减量、小增量和小递减按钮相对应的元素。Use the property to differentiate between the elements that correspond to the large-increment, large-decrement, small-increment, and small-decrement buttons.

related.span: UI 自动化对 ScrollBar 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the ScrollBar Control Type

Public Shared ReadOnly Separator As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个分隔符，它在控件（例如菜单和工具栏）中创建一个可视的分隔。

span.span: Identifies a separator, which creates a visual division in controls like menus and toolbars.

related.span: UI 自动化对 Separator 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Separator Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Slider
Public Shared ReadOnly Slider As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个滑块控件。

span.span: Identifies a slider control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件类型包含一组与控件相关联的按钮 ，该控件使用户能够从一组项中进行选择，或者从范围内设置一个数值。A control type consists of a set of buttons associated with an control that enable a user to select from a set of items or set a numerical value from within a range.

related.span: UI 自动化对 Slider 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Slider Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Spinner
Public Shared ReadOnly Spinner As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个微调控件。

span.span: Identifies a spinner control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件类型包含一组按钮，这些按钮使用户能够从一组项中进行选择，或者从范围内设置一个数值。A control type consists of a set of buttons that enable a user to select from a set of items or set a numerical value from within a range.

related.span: UI 自动化对 Spinner 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Spinner Control Type

summary.span: 标识一个拆分按钮，该按钮将执行默认操作，并且还可以扩展到其他可能操作的列表。

span.span: Identifies a split button, which is a button that performs a default action and can also expand to a list of other possible actions.

summary.span: 标识一个编辑控件，例如一个文本框或多格式文本框。

span.span: Identifies an edit control, such as a text box or rich text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以作为独立控件（例如 控件）或子组件（例如， 用户可以在其中键入值的区域）。A control can be used as a standalone control, such as an control, or as a subcomponent, such as the area of a where a user can type in a value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Tree
Public Shared ReadOnly Tree As ControlType

summary.span: 标识一个树控件。

span.span: Identifies a tree control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件类型是 或控件类型的分层排列的容器 。A control type is a container for a hierarchical arrangement of or control types. 树的每个节点都可以包含其他节点。Each node of a tree can contain other nodes. 包含子节点的节点可以显示为展开或折叠。A node that contains child nodes can be displayed as expanded or collapsed.

related.span: UI 自动化对 Tree 控件类型的支持

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Tree Control Type

span.span: Identifies a node in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件类型只能用作控件的子控件 。A control type can be used only as a subcontrol of a control.
